function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of germicidal ultraviolet (GUV) air disinfection leading to unchecked viral spread in the built environment.","Impact":"Uncontrolled viruses.","Mitigation":"Research and scientific studies to better understand the modes of transmission of respiratory viruses, including the role of airborne transmission.","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis, epidemiological studies, and laboratory research.","People":"Public health researchers, epidemiologists, and healthcare professionals.","Owner":"Public health institutions,
